TextView.android:text: 1. Brief Forms After you have learned the following brief forms, you will have only two more groups to go!
2. Ng The sound of ng, as in aing, is written
3. Ngk The sound of ngk, as in sink, is written
4. Omission of Vowel Preceding-tion When t, d, n, or m is followed by -ition or -ation, the circle is omitted.
